description:
Aspose.Pdf for .NET is a PDF document creation and manipulation component that enables your .NET applications to read, write and manipulate existing PDF documents without using Adobe Acrobat. It also allows you to create forms and manage form fields embedded in a PDF document. This component is written in managed C# and it allows developers to add PDF creation and manipulation functionality to their Microsoft .NET applications (WinForms, ASP.NET and .NET Compact Framework).
        Aspose.Pdf for .NET is affordable and offers an incredible wealth of features including PDF compression options; table creation and manipulation; support for graph objects; extensive hyperlink functionality; extended security controls; custom font handling; integration with data sources; add or remove bookmarks; create table of contents; add, update, delete attachments and annotations; import or export PDF form data; add, replace or remove text and images; split, concatenate, extract or inset pages; transform pages to image; print PDF documents and much more.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	
Features
PDFNET-41686	When document is printed, there is no option to print it as grayscale.
PDFNET-35936	Take fully embedded font sets and trim them down to subsets only
PDFNET-36391    Implement rotation for TextFragment

Enhancements
PDFNET-41734	Reading image file path from PDF
PDFNET-41882	Detect blank page
PDFNET-37708	Table rotates to 90 degrees
PDFNET-41692	PDF to PDFA: resultant PDFA size is increased even without embedded fonts
PDFNET-41609	XFDF line and Polygon annotation with measurements
PDFNET-42222	Problem with using Stream as input and XmlResolver

Bugs
PDFNET-42310	Text fragment is not replaced
PDFNET-40798	Exception when trying to extract text from PDF file
PDFNET-40781	KeyNotFoundException on Document.Pagesi with valid index
PDFNET-40797	NullReferenceException while extracting PDF file
PDFNET-42086	Problem setting "XmpPdfAExtensionValueType
PDFNET-41562	Text being cutoff with Google's Noto Fonts
PDFNET-42555	PDF to PDFA: decrease in quality of transparent images
PDFNET-40924	SVG images not sizing properly in PDF file
PDFNET-38824	Adding image to cell hangs the application
PDFNET-38719	PDF to PNG - Text rendering issue in resultant image
PDFNET-38525	PDF to TIFF - Form data is not appearing on image
PDFNET-41985	Blank pages when rendering specific PDF to HTML
PDFNET-36252	Mulitpage TIFF to PDF conversion cuts off right side of image
PDFNET-40726	PDF to PDFA1a: Background color is missing
PDFNET-42092	LocalHyperlink text with Font Style
PDFNET-41932	API hangs with a Floating box containing a large HtmlFragment
PDFNET-37960	Heading in FloatingBox missing from table of contents
PDFNET-42570	PDF to PDFA some text is messed up
PDFNET-42493	When PDF is converted to PDF_A_1B, output file is still classic PDF.
PDFNET-42280	PDF to PDF/A-1A conversion works incorrectly
PDFNET-36248	Thai Charaters appear to be compacted
PDFNET-42478	When PDF is converted to PDFA, the word in text is messed up.
PDFNET-42449	Table numbers messed up during PDF / PDFA conversion.
PDFNET-34814	Monospaced font is not being used when creating PDF file
PDFNET-42473	When specific PDF is converted to PDF_A_1B, output file is still classic PDF.
PDFNET-42474	When specific PDF is converted to PDF_A_1B, output file is still classic PDF.
PDFNET-38953	PDF to PDFA1b: output PDFA1b fails compliance verfication
PDFNET-36781	PDF to JPEG: some of UNICODE characters rendered incorrectly
PDFNET-38135	Aspose not reading Custom Fonts
PDFNET-38795	PDF to HTML conversion loses the text
PDFNET-40847	Dynamic PDF form flattening issue
PDFNET-40474	PDF to PDF/A - Resultant file is not compliant
PDFNET-40679	PDF to HTML: TOC links are lost in output HTML
PDFNET-40680	PDF to PDF/A - Resultant file is not compliant
summary: Aspose.Pdf for .NET is an amazing component which provides the feature to create and manipulate PDF documents.
title: Aspose.Pdf for .NET
